p: Traditionally, ginger and ginger volatile oils, curcumin, Panax L. ( Araliaceae) and garlic are recommended and used to strengthen immunity and reduce the likelihood of inflammatory respiratory diseases [ 2, 17, 18]. In an in vitro study [ 19], Allium sativum L. ( Amaryllidaceae) extract inhibited influenza A (H 1N 1) virus by inhibiting the synthesis of viral nucleoproteins and polymerase activity. The paper recommended a decoction of Allium cepa L. ( Amaryllidaceae) for colds [ 20].
